add_map_list.name: final_three
add_map_list.mapping: concat(case when rand_one <= 0.1 then 'one' when rand_one <= 0.2 then 'two' when rand_one <= 0.3 then 'three' when rand_one <= 0.4 then 'four' when rand_one <= 0.5 then 'five' when rand_one <= 0.6 then 'six' when rand_one <= 0.7 then 'seven' when rand_one <= 0.8 then 'eight' when rand_one <= 0.9 then 'nine' else 'wow' end, rand_one, rand_two)

add_map_list.name: final_four
add_map_list.mapping: concat(cast((rand_one * rand_one * rand_one * 200) as string), new_id)

hql: select a.*, concat(rand_one, rand_two, rand_three, rand_four) c1 from tbl_base a join (select * from num_sample limit 1) b
